|rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2050; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-TNC |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Gemtek WX5541 (WX5541_V00) WAP54G v1.1 serial numbers appear to begin with '''MDG1'''. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=159654 Some WAP54G v1.1s may instead use WX5561 boards], like the [[SparkLAN WX-6800]]. [http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/linksys/wap54g WAP54G series on the OpenWrt wiki]
[http://dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WAP54G On the DD-WRT wiki] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRTNotice|vintmicroreq}} {{DDWRTNotice|k24req}} *[[TechInfoDepot:DD-WRT/Linksys WAP54G|Flashing Linksys WAP54G All Versions]] {{DDWRTNotice|wapflash}} ==Pictures==
